You're the type of American that give the rest of us a bad name (like 'sack of doorknobs'). This whole American pride, we're number one, macho bullshit is exactly that: bullshit! I'm and American but I've lived oversaeas a couple of times (a year in Sweden - which may well be number one! Go Sverige!!) and I can tell you from experience that we're NOT number one. Okay, maybe not entirely, we're absoulutely number one in these categories: assholes, fat lazy slobs, stupidity, drunks, ignorance about the rest of the world, brainwashed religious zealots, theifs, murderers, rapists, greedy corporate fucks, greedy non-corporate fucks, liars, lawyers (same as last), brainwashed flag waving "patriots", and on and on. We have maybe 5% of the world's population yet we use more than 25% of the world's natural resources. We kill foreign leaders with whom we do not agree with and replace them with puppets and kill anyone who disagrees with them. We spy on our own citizens and lie to them while we pilfer from them. Probably the worst thing that is happening in this country (besides the Bush administration) is that the stupid are breeding at a much faster rate than the intelligent. I've been saying this for years but in 2000 the truth of this was finally realized when we elected an absolute idiot rather than the extermely qualified, intelligent, honest, compassionate Al Gore. (Okay, Gore did win but the stupid majority allowed Bush to get away with the theft of the presidency.) I can no longer say I am proud to be an American, and until we wrestle this country away from the military indutrial complex that has stolen our democracy and shamed us in the reast of the world, I will continue to spit in the face of my own nation. I have the right to do that as an American - at least for a little while longer I hope.
